title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.12 - Careless, negligent, or reckless operation of aircraft prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.12 - Careless, negligent, or reckless operation of aircraft prohibited

State Regulations

No aircraft shall be operated on the surface of any part of
the airport in a careless or negligent manner or in disregard of the rights and
safety of others, or without due caution and circumspection, or at a speed or
in a manner which endangers, or is likely to endanger persons or property, or
while the pilot, or any other person aboard controlling any part of the
operation thereof, is under the influence of intoxicating liquor, hallucinogenic substances, or any drug affecting his senses, or if such
aircraft is so constructed, equipped, or loaded as to endanger or be likely to
endanger persons or property. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
